mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.RID, A.RTITLE, A.RCONTENT, A.RSCORE, A.RPHOTO, A.RRDATE, A.MID, A.OTYPE, A.OATNAME1, A.R_ODID, A.MNAME, A.OATNAME2, A.OATNAME3, A.OVISITDATE FROM ( SELECT R.*, OD.ODID AS R_ODID, OD.*, M.MNAME FROM REVIEW R, ORDER_DETAIL OD, MEMBER M WHERE R.ODID = OD.ODID AND R.MID = M.MID
ORDER BY R.RRDATE DESC
ORDER BY R.RSCORE DESC
ORDER BY R.RSCORE ASC
AND (RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR RCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%') ORDER BY R.RRDATE DESC
AND (RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR RCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%') ORDER BY R.RSCORE DESC
AND (RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR RCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%') ORDER BY R.RSCORE ASC
) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

select.if: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR RCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'

mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW) REVIEWCOUNT, (SELECT NVL(AVG(RSCORE), 0) FROM REVIEW) AVG FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (RID, RTITLE, RCONTENT, RSCORE, RPHOTO, MID, ODID) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rtitle}, #{rcontent}, #{rscore}, #{rphoto}, #{mid}, #{odid})
